gurmukhi: khw BieE, jo Aiq ihq icq kr; bhu ibD islw pujweI ]
transliteration: Kahaa Bhaio Jo At(i) Hit Chit Kar Bahoubidh(i) Silaa Pujaaee||
translation: Of what use is the worship of the stones with devotion and sincerity in various ways?

gurmukhi: pRwn QikE pwihn kh prsq; kCu kr is`D n AweI ]1]
transliteration: Paan Thake Paahin Kahh Parsat Kachhu Kar Siddh Na Aaee||1||
translation: The hand became tired of touching the stones, because no spiritual powr accrued.1.

gurmukhi: A`Cq DUp dIp Arpq hY; pwhn kCU n KY hY ]
transliteration: Achchhat Dhoop Deep Arpat Hai Paahan Kachhodh Na Khai Hai||
translation: Rice, incense and lamps are offered, but the stones do not eat anything,

gurmukhi: qw mY khw is`D hY ry jV; qoih kCU br dY hY ]2]
transliteration: Taa Mai Kahaan Siddh Hai Re Jad Tohe Kachhodh Bar Dai Hai||2||
translation: O fool ! where is the spiritual power in them, so that they may bless you with some boon.2.

gurmukhi: jO jIX hoq, qO dyq kCu quih; kr mn bc krm ibcwr ]
transliteration: Jau Jiya Hot Det Kachhu Tuh(i) Kar Man Bach Karam Bichaar||
translation: Ponder in mind, speech and action; if they had any life they could have given you something,

gurmukhi: kyvl eyk srx suAwmI ibn; XO nih kqih auDwr ]3]9]
transliteration: Kecal Ek Sharan(i) Suaamibin Yau Nah(i) Katah(i) Udhaar||3||1||
translation: None can get salvation in any way without taking refuge in one Lord.3.1.
RAGA DEVGANDHARI OF THE TENTH KING

gurmukhi: ibn hir nwm; n bwcn pY hY ]
transliteration: Bin Har(i) Naam Na Baachanndpai Hai||
translation: None can be saved without the Name of the Lord,

gurmukhi: cOdh lok jwih bis kIny; qw qy khW plY hY ]1] rhwau ]
transliteration: Chaudha Lok Jaah(i) Bas(i) Keena Taa Te Kahaan Padai Hai||1||rahaao||
translation: He, who control al the fourteen worlds, how can you run away from Him?...Pause.

gurmukhi: rwm rhIm aubwr n sk hY; jwkr nwm rtY hY ] bRhmw ibsn rudR sUrj sis; qy bis kwl sbY hY ]1]
transliteration: Raam Raheem Oubaar Na Sak(i) Hai Jaa Kar Naam Ratai Hai|| Brahmaa Bishan Rudra Sooraj Sas(i) Te Bas(i) Kaal Sabhai Hai||1||
translation: You cannot be save by repeating the Names of Ram and Rahim, Brahma, Vishnu Shiva, Sun and Moon, all are subject to the power of Death.1.

gurmukhi: byd purwn kurwn sbY mq; jwkh nyq khY hY ]
transliteration: Bed Puraan Kuraan Sabhai Mar Jaakah Net(i) Kahai Hai||
translation: Vedas, Puranas and holy Quran and all religious system proclaim Him as indescribeable,2.

gurmukhi: ieMdR PinMdR muinMdR klp bhu; iDAwvq, iDAwn n AY hY ]2]
transliteration: Indra Phanindra Mounndndra Kalap Bahu Dhyaavat Dhyaan Na Ai Hai||2||
translation: Indra, Sheshnaga and the Supreme sage meditated on Him for ages, but could not visualize Him.2.

gurmukhi: jwkr rUp rMg nih jinXq; so ikm s√éwm khY hY ]
transliteration: Jaa Kar Roop Ran Nah(i) Janiyat So Kim Syaam Kahai Hai||
translation: He, whose form and colour are not, how can he be called black?

gurmukhi: Cutho kwl jwl qy qb hI; qwih crn lptY hY ]3]1]10]34]
transliteration: Chhout-ho Kaal Jaal Te Tab Hitaah(i) Charan Laptai Hai||3||2||
translation: You can only be liberated from the noose of Death, when you cling to His feet.3.2.
